title: По воле случая
overview: Lyudmila's husband Vitaly was hospitalized after an accident. Businessman Andrei, feeling guilty for the accident, pays for treatment and offers Lyudmila a job in his company.Soon Lyudmila realizes that she has fallen in love with Andrei... This scares her, she cannot betray her husband! Vitaly comes to his senses, and Lyudmila finds out that her husband had been cheating on her for a long time and was going to get a divorce... And Andrey's fiancee tells Lyudmila that it was he who was to blame for the accident. Lyudmila realizes with horror that Andrei has been lying to her all this time and bought her "loyalty" with money and work in the company.Lyudmila has to go through a difficult path to believe in the sincerity of a loving man and become happy.
